fact_text: The Pradhan Mantri Kisan Samman Nidhi (PM-KISAN) provides Rs 6,000 per year to eligible farmer families in three installments.
The National Green Hydrogen Mission has an outlay of Rs 19,744 crore to make India a global hub for green hydrogen.
The FAME II subsidy for electric vehicles has been extended until March 31, 2025, with a focus on public transport.
Aadhaar is a 12-digit unique identity number that can be obtained voluntarily by residents or passport holders of India.
There is no current announcement regarding free electricity for all farmers starting in July 2025; electricity is a state subject.
Chandrayaan-3 successfully landed on the lunar south pole on August 23, 2023.
The Ayushman Bharat Scheme provides health cover of Rs 5 lakhs per family per year for secondary and tertiary care hospitalization.
